name: Taiga Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Taiga Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Taiga API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Taiga API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: issue
available_options: Epic (值: epic)
Issue (值: issue)
Task (值: task)
User Story (值: userStory)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a user story
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a user story
Get (值: get) - Get a user story
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many user stories
Update (值: update) - Update a user story

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: ID of the project to set the user story to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: ID of the project to set the user story to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assigned_to (值: None) - ID of the user to whom the user story is assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
backlog_order (值: None) - Order of the user story in the backlog
blocked_note (值: None) - Reason why the user story is blocked. Requires "Is Blocked" toggle to be enabled.
description (值: None)
is_blocked (值: None) - Whether the user story is blocked
kanban_order (值: None) - Order of the user story in the kanban
milestone (值: None) - ID of the milestone of the user story. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
sprint_order (值: None) - Order of the user story in the milestone
status (值: None) - ID of the status of the user story. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tags (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
type (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

epicId.name: epicId
epicId.description: ID of the epic to update
epicId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Epic ID | 作用: ID of the epic to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: assigned_to (值: None) - ID of the user whom the user story is assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
epic (值: None) - ID of the epic to which the user story belongs. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
statusIsClosed (值: None) - Whether the user story is closed
statusIsArchived (值: None) - Whether the user story has been archived
milestone (值: None) - ID of the milestone of the user story. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
role (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
status (值: None) - ID of the status of the user story. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tags (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assigned_to (值: None) - ID of the user to assign the the user story to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
backlog_order (值: None) - Order of the user story in the backlog
blocked_note (值: None) - Reason why the user story is blocked. Requires "Is Blocked" toggle to be enabled.
description (值: None)
is_blocked (值: None) - Whether the user story is blocked
kanban_order (值: None) - Order of the user story in the kanban
milestone (值: None) - ID of the milestone of the user story. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
subject (值: None)
sprint_order (值: None) - Order of the user story in the milestone
status (值: None) - ID of the status of the user story. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tags (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
type (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

issueId.name: issueId
issueId.description: ID of the issue to update
issueId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue ID | 作用: ID of the issue to update | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: ID of the task to update
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: ID of the task to update | (必填项)

userStoryId.name: userStoryId
userStoryId.description: ID of the user story to update
userStoryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Story ID | 作用: ID of the user story to update | (必填项)
